notes:
Example:

Channel 1 - Vegetables zone; Zone A (near the top of the hill)

Channel 2 - Fruits zone; Zone B (100m from shed)

Channel 3 - reserved for later

Channel 4 - Durian trees; Zone C (East of shed)

Channel 5,6,7 - not used

Channel 8 - main valve (necessary to shut off main water inlet in case power outage; relays are NC when microcontroller control pin are inactive state)
